title: Request A/V Support for a Campus Event
description: A faculty member is hosting a guest lecture and needs a microphone and projector set up in the auditorium.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and the details of their existing room booking (auditorium, date, time).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the existing event reservation.

tasks.description: Collect the specific A/V requirements (e.g., 1 wireless lavalier microphone, 1 projector).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the A/V needs.

tasks.description: Create a work order for the A/V services team to set up and support the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the A/V support.
